bannerText2:
Enjoy exceptional craftsmanship, competitive prices, and a seamless shopping experience, 
backed by excellent customer service and fast shipping. Transform your living space with LWSKart 
where quality meets style..
footerTextLine: Transform your living space with LWSKart,  where quality meets style
aggreetoTerms: I have read and agree to the
terms: 1. Introduction: Welcome to LWS-Kart. By using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions.
2. Account Registration: You must create an account to make a purchase. Ensure that the information provided is accurate and up-to-date.
3. Product Descriptions: We strive to provide accurate product descriptions. However, we do not warrant that the descriptions or other content is accurate, complete, reliable, or error-free.
4. Pricing: All prices are listed in USD and are subject to change without notice. We are not responsible for typographical errors regarding pricing.

5. Orders: All orders are subject to acceptance and availability. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason, including product availability and errors in product or pricing information.
6. Payment: Payment must be made in full at the time of purchase. We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards and online payment services.
7. Shipping and Delivery: We will make every effort to deliver products in a timely manner. Delivery times are estimates and we are not responsible for delays beyond our control.
8. Returns and Refunds: We accept returns within 30 days of delivery. Products must be in original condition and packaging. Refunds will be issued to the original payment method.
9. Warranty: Our products come with a limited warranty. Please refer to the product page for specific warranty details. We are not responsible for damage caused by misuse or normal wear and tear.
10. Privacy: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand our practices regarding your personal information.
11. Limitation of Liability: LWS-Kart is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use our website or products.
12. Governing Law: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which LWS-Kart operates.
13. Changes to Terms: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website.
14. Contact Information: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, please contact our customer service team at support@lwskart.com.
cartRemoveMessage: Products will be removed from the cart in 30 minutes from the time they are are added to cart  if payment is not completed
noProductsOnWishlist: No products added to wish list
aboutUsText:
Welcome to LWSKart, your premier destination for top-quality furniture that transforms your living spaces into stylish, comfortable havens. Specializing in a wide range of products including mattresses, sofas, bedroom sets, living room essentials, and outdoor furniture, LWSKart is dedicated to meeting all your furnishing needs with elegance and affordability. 
 Founded with a passion for exceptional design and a commitment to quality, LWSKart offers an extensive collection of furniture that caters to diverse tastes and preferences. Whether you're seeking a plush mattress for restful nights, a chic sofa to elevate your living room, or durable outdoor furniture to enhance your patio, we have you covered.
At LWSKart, we prioritize craftsmanship and customer satisfaction. Each piece in our collection is carefully curated and crafted from the finest materials, ensuring both beauty and durability. Our dedicated team of designers and artisans work meticulously to create furniture that not only looks stunning but also provides utmost comfort and functionality.
Shopping at LWSKart is designed to be a seamless and enjoyable experience. Our user-friendly website allows you to browse our vast catalog, view detailed product descriptions, and explore high-resolution images, all from the comfort of your home. We offer reliable shipping options and exceptional customer service to ensure your shopping experience is smooth and satisfying.
Join us at LWSKart, where we are committed to helping you create inviting, stylish, and comfortable spaces. Thank you for choosing LWSKart, where quality meets affordability, and style meets comfort.
